about_the_game:
Descend into the depths of terror with NoSleep Nightmare Chronicles, a chilling anthology of immersive horror tales drawn from the dark recesses of the r/NoSleep subreddit. Powered by Unreal Engine 5, this spine-tingling collection of adventures delivers a photorealistic experience that blurs the line between nightmare and reality.

Embark on a journey through meticulously crafted narratives that have captivated over 18 million readers, now brought to life in a new interactive medium. Traverse hauntingly detailed settings and unravel the mysteries lurking within each story as you interact with your surroundings.

From heart-pounding survival horror to mind-bending puzzles, each episode offers a unique gameplay experience while maintaining the unsettling atmosphere of its source material. Immerse yourself in the first-person perspective, becoming the protagonist of each twisted tale.

As you step into the shoes of various storytellers from the NoSleep community, prepare to confront unimaginable horrors and fight to survive against all odds. Keep your wits about you. Danger might lurk around any corner in this harrowing journey through the depths of human fear.


Season one of NoSleep brings you six standalone horror stories to experience firsthand.

Each episode combines immersive walking simulator exploration mechanics with narrative storytelling, inviting you to explore and interact with the environment to uncover the lore of the tales you find yourself in.

NoSleep also draws from classic survival horror gameplay. You'll encounter unique puzzles, environmental obstacles, and gut-churning foes within each story as you progress through the anthology.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains realistic depictions of violence and horror.

  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12

Recommended:
